text: Multiball may refer to: * Multiball system, a method in association football where an assistant supplies another football when the original ball has gone out of play * A situation in pinball where several balls are in play at the same time * A training method in table tennis where balls are continuously fed to the player, either by another player or a ball robot * A challenging variation of table football, where the game is played with two balls. A multiball occurs when one team scores both balls. If both teams have a score of 9, the winner can be decided by the next multiball.
title: Multiball
